All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AdminCityController
Entry point for admin functionality related to city.
AdminMessageController
Entry point for admin functionality related to messages.
AdminUserController
Entry point for admin functionality related to users.
BotConfiguration
Configuration for telegramBot with beans creation rules
City
class City represent the City entity, which is an element in CityRepository contains id, name, latitude, longitude parameters.
CityController
Entry point for common functionality related to city.
CityRepository
CityRepository interface extends org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<City,Integer>.
CityService
interface for implementation of service methods working with CityRepository
CommonAdvice
 
Datum
 
EntityValidationException
 
Forecast
DTO for Forecast result of execution WeatherForecast.locate() method WeatherForecast
JpaCityService
JpaCityService class implements methods of CityService contains cityRepository CityRepository and userRepository UserRepository parameters
JpaMessageService
JpaCityService class implements methods of MessageService contains messageRepository MessageRepository
JpaTaskService
JpaUserService class implements methods of TaskService contains taskRepository TaskRepository
JpaUserService
JpaUserService class implements methods of UserService contains userRepository UserRepository
Location
DTO for Location, contains required parameters for correct receiving of the forecast parameter of method forecast() WeatherForecast result of execution of locate() metod Locator
Locator
Interface providing the method locate
Message
class Message represent the Message entity, which is an element in MessageRepository contains id of message, its content, chatId of TelegramBot, userId of TelegramBot, createdAt parameters.
MessageRepository
MessageRepository interface extends org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<Message,Integer>.
MessageService
interface for implementation of service methods working with MessageRepository
OpenAILocator
Class OpenAILocator using OpenAiService and objectMapper parameters, implements methods of interface Locator, provides information about location from received data using OpenAI
Password
Structure that holds raw and encrypted password
RandomPasswordGenerator
Class for encoding of raw password
Response
 
Result<T>
Common interface that represents result of an operation.
Result.Failure<T>
represents unsuccessful result and optionally holds exception
Result.Success<T>
represents successful result and holds expected data
Role
class Role represent the Role entity, which is an element in RoleRepository contains id, name, users parameters.
RoleRepository
RoleRepository interface extends org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<Role,Integer>.
ScheduledForecastTask
class ScheduledForecastTask represent the ScheduledForecastTask entity, which is an element in TaskRepository contains id, description, executedAt, chatId, cityId parameters.
ScheduleExecutor
ScheduleExecutor class responsible for Task execution.
SecurityConfiguration
SecurityConfiguration with rules for authorization
TaskRepository
TaskRepository interface extends org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<ScheduledForecastTask,Integer>.
TaskService
interface for implementation of service methods working with TaskRepository
TelegramBot
Implementation of Logic of TelegramBot, methods of TelegramLongPollingBot.
TelegramBotApplication
 
Temperature
DTO for Temperature with value in CELSIUS
Temperature.Grad
 
User
class User represent the User entity, which is an element in UserRepository contains id, name, password, chatId, addedAt, roles and cities parameters.
UserCityController
Entry point for user functionality related to city.
UserRepository
UserRepository interface extends org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<User,Integer>.
UserService
interface for implementation of service methods working with UserRepository
Weather
 
WeatherAPI
Class WeatherAPI using restTemplate and environment parameters, implements methods of interface WeatherForecast, provides information about forecast from received location using any Forecast service
WeatherbitForecastResponse
 
WeatherForecast
Interface providing the method forecast
